component.name: updateFile
component.description: Adds new content to a file

component.name: copyFile
component.description: creates a copy of the specified file

component.name: trashFile
component.description: moves a file to the trash

component.name: untrashFile
component.description: restores a file from the trash

component.name: watchFile
component.description: watching for changes to a file

component.name: deleteFile
component.description: Permanently deletes a file by ID and skips the trash.

component.name: touchFile
component.description: Set the file's updated time to the current server time.
